channel.title: Need Help with Firefox
channel.description: I just downloaded FireFox Today,i'm Connected to the internet and everything-It won't let me load any pages or anything: [URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img64.imageshack.us/img64/8361/firefoxnotworkingad9.png[/img][/URL] Please Help

item.title: Need Help with Firefox
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Opera is not the fastest browser, if I had to bet it would be links.

Look at the proxy settings for firefox and make sure they are configured right.

Read full topic
